content.detailedDescription: I saw ufo pass by from south to north today at 7:15pm while on balcony bending down on floor looked up to 3 orion stars. this time is very far high up in the sky like a tiny star than the last time i saw is nearer and bigger like the biggest star. the color is white again and smooth going and very fast like a jet plane. i saw this object and quickly take binocular spot it. neighbour told me it was satellite
content.summary: I saw ufo pass by from south to north today at 7:15pm while on balcony bending down on floor looked up to 3 orion stars. this time is very far high up in the sky like a tiny star than the last time i saw is nearer and bigger like the biggest star.

content.detailedDescription: I have to confess i am really trying to use your web site in hopes that someone in your organization can help me contact bill birnes from ufo files don't want anything out of this for myself except help  for real been scared now for over 30 years i am pissed pardon my french that a lot of strange shit has been going on  i am completely sane  i have had over 9 things since 1977 including an abduction when i was 11 years old im so serious its unreal  i cry over this and its haunted me since  im pissed at the government because i know they know what is going on and i feel like i deserve an anser  this is the first time ive ever told anyone other than 2 friends ive had for over 28 years  my moms had some weird stuff to i think its all connected  the sighting i listed was awhile ago ive had 2 since because i just don't know where to start its like been my whole life they usually happen once every 3 to 4 years i don't want men in black coming to my door am i paranoid mabey a little since i sent u this but i don't care anymore  if whoever they are wanted to kill me they would of done it by now please help please don't give my name to anyone or ill never admit to everything i just told you there is a lot and i have a feeling its only just begun for some strange reason i feel like they know i just did this if you can contact me ill be more than willing to open up this is very rel and i cant belive im doing this its just been going on for so long i don't know what else to do and cant get anywhere else on the internet its always dead ends thank you so much please please only contact me if you are for real.
content.summary: Cant go ther just 1 of 8 now since 1977

content.detailedDescription: I had stepped outside to take out garbage.  immediately upon walking outside, i saw a bright "star" up in the northern sky.  it was a bright off white light with a hue of yellow/orange to it, approximately as bright as a magnitude -4 to -5 star or planet.  while i was walking, it looked like it could be moving so i stopped walking.  i discerned that it was moving at a moderate speed  towards the east.  i continued watching it and decided to try to get my phone out to get a picture of it.  by the time i reached the trash can, and got my camera ready, i had lost sight of it behind a tree.  i walked away from the tree to see if i could still make out the object, but it had disappeared from my view by then.
content.summary: Saw a steady whitish-orange star like object moving to the east

content.detailedDescription: Our first night in scottsdale, i just got back to our hotel room after dinner, about 8pm. we are staying at the westin kierland resort. i went on to our balcony to make a phone call, the balcony faces north/northeast....And in the distance i saw two extremely bright white lights just hovering above the clouds in the horizon. then as i watched them, i noticed they didn't move at all. i saw an airplane, clearly blinking it's lights and moving past them. they didn't resemble the planes lights at all. then suddenly, a third light appeared out of no where to the left of the other two lights. they all lined up perfectly and sat there for a few minutes, i got a few photos. then the light on the right started slowly moving towards the right, then the middle followed slowly, then the far left light followed until they were all out of view, behind the building, so i couldn't see them anymore. hands down, the most incredible sighting i've ever experienced.
content.summary: Saw two bright hovering large lights in sky, then 3rd appeared - they all say there for a few minutes, then one by one moved to the right.

content.detailedDescription: Saw in front window a white light blinking and was gone, went to my back window and saw white light move to my right and assend up, then another one came it did the same. i looked to my right and saw large golden orange object it then was gone to. there was lots of jets in the area .
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw a white light blinking , gone other window saw two object blinking,to a large orange object.

content.detailedDescription: For the past month i have been noticing odd pulsating and flashing lights in the sky. tonight i decided to see if there was still any activity (to test my sanity i suppose). to my shock this was the most active i have seen the sky yet. i watched the sky for just over 2 hours, and within this time i noticed pulsating, and erratic flashing objects moving in the sky. at one point there were 3  flying objects merging together that were flashing green, red, white, and blue lights. my dog was outside with me and even she was uneasy, (whining, pacing, growling). i thing the thing that shocked me the most was a pulsating light that had been hovering for about an hour and 50 minutes, and watching it glide diagonally in the sky, slowly at fist and then gained speed and flew out of sight. when all this was occurring, i noticed that i began to feel zoned out, and was developing a ringing in my ears, along with a heightened sense of anxiety and feeling quite uncomfortable. this seems to be a weekly event where i live, and subsequently have been experiencing dreams of ufo's and aliens. i need to invest in a better camera to capture what i am seeing in person. at this time my cell phone only pics up a faint dot on my screen, and does not give my experiences any justice.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 10+ diamond shaped orbs pulsated, flashed and ascended into sky from stationary position.

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: At about 7:10 pm tonight (2/19/16, i was sitting in my car waiting for my wife to come out of hanafords supermarket in wappingersfals ny. a red light moving up and down through the trees north of me on rt9 maybe a mile away no more then 1 1/2 and on the other side of the street caught my eye. then another and another just a few hundred feet apart. i got out of the car and witnessed about 6 objects gaining altitude moving slowly in generally a straight path. i did not hear any noise from the objects. i have never seen anything like this so i grabbed my iphone and began to record them as more appeared from behind the trees just like the first one. my wife came out at that time and saw them as well. all were structures with two red glowing parts stacked on top of each other almost like an hourglass. taller then wider.  all  10 objects seems the same.  they all continued until flying into the clouds one behind the other.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Objecst apeared to be long rather then wide. like two tessla balls stacked ontop of eachother moving higher as it moved to the north east

content.detailedDescription: I was in my apartment laying down around 8:00 pm i was doing meditative prayers and i noticed a yellow-white pulsating light combined with a red pulsating light on a space craft 200 ft. away from my body, the base color of the crasft was silver.  i got out of my bed and i waved to the craft.  just then it stopped to pause a little while in the air. after being still for 12 seconds it slowly flew in a figure eight that was about 80 ft. in radius.  then it stopped for another 12 seconds where i could see it, i stood still.  i waved then again gently and the craft flew in two circles 40 ft. in radius.  after i peeked further out of my window it slowly jolted across and over my apartment where it took off to the northwest of my apartment, i could only see where it left over my apartment building.  i was excited so i stayed up thinking about who i was going to tell that i saw an extra terrestrial spceship.  i have had other encounters with alien spacecrafts over my life, and i have been touched by extra terrestrials in my bed and twice on a spaceship.  the reason extra terrestrials come to me friendly is because they know that i know about who they are and that i am very psychic and telepathic and i communicate with them gently, and i have been communicating with them all my life.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Slowly flying over my apartment about 200 ft. high a silver disk with yellow-white lights and red lights pulsating around to a point flew slowly in a figure eight pattern then in two slow circles so that i could see it;i waved at it and it darted off east

content.detailedDescription:
2 instances.
1=woke up for a few seconds and felt like if i was under heavy anesthesia. saw three small white glowing dark lens aliens standing next to the bed and on of  the little people was looking at my right knee. in my right knee i have a small egg like object he i think is calcium deposit. it hides in side my knee and something its very painful because it inserts it self in between the knee joint as you walk un aware of it. suddenly insert and cause a huge pain.I saw another one on  the left side  of the bed. it was just standing there doing nothing. the third one was near my head but they were all looking towers  the bottom part of my body.

2=i woke one day after setting up a webcam, to observe my self sleeping when i awaken, i felt a huge electrical sphere around my body, and again a feeling of waking up with anesthesia. i felt that i was or had been elevated on to the ceiling or out to threw roof.

i have also awaken more 15 times suddenly with the same feeling of anastasia in the past. now its mostly gone and, i don't fall sleep deeply like in those days.
content.summary: Examination

content.detailedDescription: After noticing a star outside normal position around my home, i took a photo. after blowing up the picture & changing the lighting. i can see a triangular shape at the rear of object and an odd outline of something else attached. these photos are on my facebook page. jamie f white (photo of me in black tank top. always cars for background). i just can't explain what it was.
content.summary: I noticed a star that was out of position from normal for my home area. took photos

content.detailedDescription:
I was hiking ruby creek fire road, off lake hughes drive about 10 miles north of castaic lake, california.  i hiked 2.5 miles up from the trailhead.  i was hiking barefoot as always, and was paying close attention to the trail conditions.  on my way down i discovered markings in the fire road.  at first i thought they were from a hiker drawing with a stick or a motorcycle spinning out in a circle, until i realized the markings were clearly impressions in the soil.  i do not know if they were there on my way up or not and can not say if the markings were minutes or a day old. they were fresh enough to notice clearly however.

i first noticed a small curved line about 12 inches. it was the deepest mark that had cleared all surface gravel away.  i then noticed the large circle about 40 inches in diameter which was the one that convinced me it was an impression from a very heavy object.  after a few minutes i found the other smaller circles.  i searched for a logical 3rd smaller circle but could not find one in the area most likely.  the depressions were positioned in the only way possible due the the adjacent hillsides and spanned about 12-14 feet long and across the road.  coincidentally in the center of two of the circles, were weeds that had been flattened in exactly the same direction. there was also no evidence of thrust or forced air disturbance from a take off visible on the dirt surface of the road.  i studied the site for at least 20 minutes before resuming my hike, but my gut reaction was, i was convinced it was not a landing pattern from any man made craft or drone. i did not have a camera and i was unable to return before rain surely washed it away. it has remained heavily on my mind.

this fire road has been closed to vehicle traffic for at least 2 years due to a wild fire and washed out road at the trailhead. only motorcycles and hikers can reach the area.  i had hiked here a few times recently over two weeks and the same set of motorcycle tracks has remained in that time.  i very rarely ever encounter anyone on the trail and i am usually hiking for about 5 hours.

i am a person who has never doubted existence of other life in the universe and this has served as personal confirmation of it.  i will be hiking there again soon and i will be paying even closer attention.

i am posting to see if anyone else has ever seen this particular landing gear pattern?
content.summary: Discovered a depression of an imprint from ufo landing

content.detailedDescription: One afternoon i decided to go outside for no apparent reason. i just stood in my driveway and looked out at the sky. planes and helicopters fly by my house everyday but in this particular afternoon, none passed by. however, i noticed a silver disc-shaped object hovering where i was looking. it was still and did not move for what felt like a long period of time. the moment that observation clicked in my head was when i knew that it was not a plane or helicopter. the longer i looked at it, the more i felt like it was watching me. that was when it started to slowly move in my direction. i had felt like my feet were rooted to the ground until i noticed that i was heading towards me. i lost sight of it the moment i ran inside my house.
content.summary: Silver disc object hovered above neighborhood then slowly came towards me.

content.detailedDescription: My wife, my two children and i sat at a table on the second floor of la posta restaurant located on the malecon in puerto vallarta, looking at the sunset. we had clear views of the ocean and it was still light outside when a orange glow appeared on the horizon after the sun set completely. at first, we thought it was an airplane or a helicopter, especially when the object stopped on the horizon after following a path going from south west to north west. it hovered, went up a few feet above the horizon, hovered some more, then shot up over a mile in about 2 seconds, which is the pictures i am attaching here with this report. at that point, when it shot up the way it did, we knew it could not have been an helicopter. when it came back down at the same speed to stop and hover on the horizon again, we knew it was not an airplane, a flare, a helicopter or a jet. when the object moved afterwards, it followed a straight line path following the horizon heading south west, stopped, followed a similar path in the opposite direction heading north west then came back in the same location where it hovered again before shooting upward, duplicating the same path it followed previously. we witnessed these moves for over 10 minutes until it came back down on the horizon and disappeared in a south west direction. i was convinced this was a ufo based on its behaviour and my wife had some reservations until she saw the ufo shooting up a mile or so above the horizon on a 90 degree angle. she then took her canon camera and took those two shots.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A redish-orange light appeared after sunset when we sat down at a pizzeria with our 3 and 5 years old children. it hovered and moved in a strange manner.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were stargazing in an open field. at first we thought an airplane was approaching. when it got closer we heard no sound or blinking lights at all. it was going straight from west to east along the horizon and then it started zigzaging. our jaws dropped in disbelief. as i attempted to grab my phone to record it the shape dimmed out. a few seconds later it reappeared further far away in the sky and was resuming a vertical fly this time and again it dimmed out.
content.summary: Orb of light

content.detailedDescription: Noticed objects on webcam when camera refreshed objects were gone.
content.summary: Noticed on web cam could be float plane ?

content.detailedDescription:
A 10" lizard (strapped to a tree) jumped out at my car. i might have just been tired or something...But honestly its real. it has to be to keep my inflated ego up there with the rest of the mufon idots sorry investigators.
like you said to michael horn, it’s his case or the highway. no other cases or ufo contacts need apply. well this indeed does sound like your saying "it’s our/my case or the highway"
are you really trying to convince me that a giant lizard would jump out into the path of your car, was he trying to get your attention or were you just tired and hallucinating. at least in this day and age you would have had a camera on your phone, take some photos (no photoshop aloud now), and put them on the web.
oh wait….You don’t have any !! 
fail.
content.summary: 10" lizard - jumped out at me...Honest

content.detailedDescription: I was up before sunrise hunting, and at first light, a geometric pattern of what i thought were lights (star-like in appearance), caught my eye.  they moved slowly in unison and tight (but random) formation from west to east (towards the rising sun), without sound, contrails, etc.  as the sun rose, i realized that they were not lit, but illuminated and visible by the angle of the rising sun.  i lost sight of them as daylight came on.
content.summary: See below.

content.detailedDescription:
i noticed strange lights in the sky on nov. 3, 2015 at app. 4:00 am while sitting in our spa (they weren't there almost two years ago when our old spa died). the first one i noticed was located wsw, a second almost due south, a third one towards the east and many more at all points. i looked around then and noticed there were more than 1 ine different locations, some more prominent than others. they looked like a mix of blinking lights on airplanes and the way saturn looks when close only they were brighter and more distinct. if it turned so you could see what ii took to be the front it was one bright white light. i couldn't tell their distance although they looked closer at times.
 we sat in the spa 4-5 nights that week and i saw them every time. i decided to look for them every night and noticed they didn't really show until late at night and would fade as it started getting light. then the more i looked at/for them i noticed some of them were dark and almost impossible to see. when i looked through the screen on my tablet while taking photos there were many sparkling lights all around which i didn't see with my naked eye. the ones i could see the lights of looked like a slow moving ball of mercury with black craters/shadows all through it when i looked through our small binoculars.
 a couple weeks in i decided to ask "them" a question and wrote out: why are you here" as one word per screen and caught the one in the south just before it started to fade around dawn. i shown a flash light to get it's attention then scrolled through the question, it seemed to come closer. i then noticed the one to the east was still visible so showed the question to it. i walked beside my mother-in-laws house to get out of the shadows which should have blocked the first one from my sight yet it "flew" to were it could still see me and seemed to move beside me until when i stopped it was next to the other. so instead of the two being say 45 degrees apart they were more like 10 degrees apart. they also stayed visible further past dawn than before.
 after that it seemed when i went out at night they'd move in closer. even ones that were so far away i couldn't see them would come in. not much later i started seeing "people" on our property. the animals acted as if they saw them as well, yet when i'd head their direction they'd be gone. i'd ask my husband if he could see the lights or "people" and he'd always say he couldn't and showed absolutely no interest which seemed odd to me. he's the kind of person that doesn't like too many people coming over and can't stand it at all if he doesn't know them so trespassers should have made him angry.
 i started noticing things had been changed in the house. not just things being moved but actual architectural changes. paint splatter dried to the bottom of the bath tub and last time any painting had been done was about 6 months earlier. the paneling in the living room was just barely held up with very few nails so you could actually pull it out quite far. made me suspicious so i told my husband and he said i was crazy. i forgot to look at the outside wall until a couple days later and found it had been screwed back down caulked and painted in hopes no one would notice. many random things like that. then i realized every time i told my husband something i'd noticed it wouldn't be like that the next day. i realized my husband must be part of it and saw he was different as well.
 it was around then (about a few weeks ago) i noticed many of the lights seemed to be on the ground at different points seemingly circling our property and if i went out at night they'd start coming closer. i really thought i was losing it because they'd seem just as distant but at the same time i could see them and the only thing i can figure is some kind of astral projection. the have lights at different but equal areas of their face which looks like some kind of mask. some over their body but very few and not as bright. their legs are either very short or they're on their knees on some sort of hovering transport.
 i believe they have somehow "borrowed" my husband, my mother-in-laws 2 caregivers, my mother-in-law has alzheimer's but still seems different and odd at times. my husband wears a head light when he goes to put the animals up for the night. it's just one white light but i've caught him unawares a few times coming out of the hay shed and he looks like he's wearing the same light mask i described earlier. we have cameras at his mothers for security reasons and i after viewing certain things they apparently don't want seen it changes. so if you do come be prepared to record the dvr off the tv screen so you will have it before it's not there anymore.
 i'll try sending some of the stuff i was able to keep. i had much more until they learned what i was doing and managed to get rid of some of it.
 please, please don't think i'm crazy or this is some kind of hoax on my part. things have and are getting worse and it's seeming to spread to our neighbors. it's scaring me more and more as it happens. there is more but i hope to tell you more in person. 
 i'm very worried about my husband and others. i believe i am not like them because i thought i had parasites that took 5 months to find a doctor that didn't think it was in my head and finally got meds to kill them. also, you can tell our animals see something as well.
 thank you very much for your time,   kds
content.summary: Noticed lights in sky similar to cross between airplane and saturn at closest but brighter.

 thank you very much for your time,   kds

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in my backyard with my son looking at the night sky with my infrared onocular and was following the path of an object travelling east to west with some kind of blinking pattern, but this object could not be seen with the naked eye.
while following the path of the object after about 4 minutes a second object that looked like a sphere shaped solid object crossed the path of the blinking object from behind travelling north to south. 
it crossed the path and swerved in the direction of the blinking object from behind and then suddenly changed direction and traveled south-west before disappearing from screen after 1 minute.

i cannot say for sure what the object was but i have not seen any object that can change direction as quickly as this second object was able to do. the object also seems to have paused in flight as well.

i felt nothing special after seeing the objects because i have lots of footage from viewing objects in the night sky here in australia. i have also seen a craft a few years ago that was about 300 feet above a house with a bell like shape with a light purple colored ring around the bottom and a crystal like window at the top.
most of my sightings i keep to myself, but i viewed a show "the truth about ufo's" and saw what you guys did in relation to authenticating footage.So i would my footage looked at for answers.

as i filmed the 2 objects i immediately followed the 2nd object when it entered my view and after about a minute of tracking this object it just disappeared.
content.summary: I was viewing the night sky through infrared onocular and spotted one craft travelling east to west blinking, then a 2nd craft appeared north to south.

content.detailedDescription:
I was test filming (4 minutes of 4k video) my brand new camera by recording a lightning storm that came through an hour or less earlier, over brisbane from my veranda at home (west side of brisbane). 

i didn't pay any special attention to the object (assuming it was a commercial aircraft) until i played back the video on my computer monitor. i since zoomed in for a closer look. 

it was first seen flying horizontally, then climbed fairly steeply in opposite direction of nearest airport. i estimate clouds were at least 80km (50 miles) away, in the moreton bay (ocean) area at least, of the north side of the city centre.

it glowed brightly the entire time, which has made me think further, that if it was a 'normal' aircraft, it would have to be flying sideways for it's forward facing lights to stay the constant brightness!

after 20 seconds, it flew out of frame, but curiously, when it came out of the cloud cover, my camera immediately, massively lost auto focus, which it had not done for the rest of the 4 minute video, before or after the object became visable to me.

object appears near bottom right side of video.
(video is as seen - not zoomed in)
content.summary: Ufo flying through lightning storm i was filming. object climbed fairly steeply in opposite direction of nearest airport. i estimate clouds were at least 80km (50 miles) away

content.detailedDescription:
I was test filming (4 minutes of 4k video) my brand new camera by recording a lightning storm that came through an hour or less earlier, over brisbane from my veranda at home (west side of brisbane). 

i didn't pay any special attention to the object (assuming it was a commercial aircraft) until i played back the video on my computer monitor. i since zoomed in for a closer look. 

it was first seen flying horizontally, then climbed fairly steeply in opposite direction of nearest airport. i estimate clouds were at least 80km (50 miles) away, in the moreton bay (ocean) area at least, of the north side of the city centre.

it glowed brightly the entire time, which has made me think further, that if it was a 'normal' aircraft, it would have to be flying sideways for it's forward facing lights to stay the constant brightness!

after 20 seconds, it flew out of frame, but curiously, when it came out of the cloud cover, my camera immediately, massively lost auto focus, which it had not done for the rest of the 4 minute video, before or after the object became visable to me.

object appears near bottom right side of video.
(video is as seen - not zoomed in)
content.summary: Ufo flying through lightning storm i was filming. object climbed fairly steeply in opposite direction of nearest airport. i estimate clouds were at least 80km (50 miles) away

content.detailedDescription:
We observed white and red lights in a row appearing to be part of a craft. it hovered at a distance changing position. it stayed at the same altitude. it would come in with one to two bright white lights which appeared to be part of a reflective surface. more red lights would be added in a straight row ranging from six to around ten lights, mostly red. they would fade out, disappear for awhile then reappear at different positions sometimes with different intensities. the lights were straddling or positioning from left and right of a radio tower in the immediate foreground.
upon reappearing one time with lights numbering eight to ten light ejected one upward and to the right(east) of the array.
a tree in the foreground was between me and the tower bracketing the lights.
i was on a porch across the street from the tree and the tower. i had the impression this object was large and far away.

my wife and i were waiting on a porch at the door to be let in the building  for a meeting. we watched the sighting for about 35 to 40 minutes. noticed the lights framed by tree branches against a dark sky. the white lights were bright an the brightest lights in the sky. i just happened to be positioned to watch the northern part of the sky.
i was curious and thought they might be aircraft landing lights. i stayed focus on them because it became obvious that they were very bright and strings of more lights would appear to complete a row.
i use to be a member of colo. mufon and began to think of things i needed to pay attention to. i took mental notes, try to take picture, marked time and detail of activities.
i had to go into my meeting and lost sight upon returning to the porch
i went home and began writing extensive notes.

my feeling are that we saw a large hovering object a distance away emitting bright lights that showed a reflective surface with more lights appearing that were red.
the radio tower or clouds might obscured the object causing some of the variation in their numbers.
i went back at 7am this morning and took pictures to better view the field in daylight to better determine the elevation of the object etc.
i went back tonight in darkness at the same time 18:00 to eliminate repeated reflections of lights that might occur and to reaffirm my evaluation of what i saw.
content.summary: Observed white and red lights in a row appearing to be part of a craft. it hovered at a distance changing position, ejecting an object

content.detailedDescription: I was headed home with my husband and decided to take a picture of some cloud coverage, i was headed down a road called indian road when i snapped the two photos on a continuous shot. i didn't see anything before i took the photos and i never seen anything after the photos until later on in the evening when i transfered them to my phone. when i saw that t there was some sort of unknown object in the second that wasn't in the first photo i began to think that maybe there was something more to the object. whatever it was had to be moving at a very quick speed for me to know see it before or after the photos were taken. i can't tell you anything else as far as speed, color, light ect.I just want someone to take a look at thsee photos and put my mind to rest because i'm starting to think that i am crazy.
content.summary: Just need someone to examine a couple of pictures and tell me what i have captured on camera that i never seen even looking through the lens

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work heading down hwy 50 towards union. i was in the gerald area.  i saw a translucent glowing disc zip across the road and disappear in the treeline. almost immediately, i noticed a glowing light on the road in front of me.  i slowed down and took a few pictures.  the last picture was taken right as i was descending into this object from my car. i shouldn't use the word "zoom" because i actually got closer to the light physically.
content.summary: I saw a translucent glowing disc zip across the road and then disappear above the treelines. almost immediately, i noticed a glowing light in the street.

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 7:25 pm and the night was calm and clear.  i first noticed the brightly shining object ne of my position at about 75 degrees from the horizon.  it was traveling quite rapidly and steadily, bearing about 100, maintaining the same altitude as far as i could tell, and appeared to be about 1 1/2 to maybe 3 miles away when i first noticed it.  at its nearest, had it been a prop plane and certainly a jet or helicopter, i would have heard some noise (particularly on a calm night), but in this case i didn't hear anything.  it had no navigation lights nor blinking lights that i could see.  it appeared to be about 3 times the size of venus at its brightest, from my perspective.   
what struck me as odd was the lack of noise and nav lights as well as the fact that it appeared as lit brightly white and was traveling away from me.  it would make sense if it was coming straight at me with 1 landing light on.  i called my wife over to where she could see and we watched it fade many miles away to the brightness of a typical star then finally lost sight of it.  it lasted about 3 minutes total.
in comparison, as i type this i could hear a prop plane from inside the house. when i stepped out to look at it, it's white tail light was maybe the brightness of the north star and it had clearly visible navigation lights and a white flashing anti-collision light.  i would estimate it to be 3-4 miles away and moving very slow relative to the earlier aircraft i saw.
content.summary: Bright object making no noise about 3 times the size of venus traveling away steadily and rapidly.
